overview: Glamour-loving, porn-obsessed director Jonni Darkko returns to a classic theme in "Bikini-Clad Cum Sluts 2," a sequel to his popular title in which a bevy of gorgeous swimsuit girls engage in filthy, nasty fucking and sucking, often while still wearing their sexy, two-piece suits. Like models in a sporting-wear catalog that have turned delightfully perverted, these sensuous bikini beauties tease us, bursting out of their skimpy beachwear for tastes of thick, hard cock. The director has assembled a stunning, multi-national crew of total cum sluts for your entertainment.
title: Bikini Clad Cum Sluts 2
